title: Workshop on Strengthening Teaching Motivation and Designing Mathematics Pedagogy

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic mathematical concepts and possession of teaching experience
context.additional_context: Learners, as general citizens, explore instructional design methods based on their experiences in math education settings or participation in educational programs, including supplementary activities using digital devices.

learning_goals: Participants can diagnose teaching motivation based on self-determination theory and explain at least two strategies to enhance intrinsic motivation.
Participants can interpret regression analysis results from surveys to analyze correlations with instructional design methods.
Participants develop and present an instructional design model applicable to actual mathematics classes through project-based assessment.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
